0bfe159d-ec42-4b6c-bf17-12eebf286584.description: Filter metrics based on the Kubernetes namespace where Kong is deployed.
0bfe159d-ec42-4b6c-bf17-12eebf286584.name: namespace

179f32b3-4fd1-4b65-b366-9e465bdf3138.description: Select specific Kong route to filter metrics.
179f32b3-4fd1-4b65-b366-9e465bdf3138.name: route
179f32b3-4fd1-4b65-b366-9e465bdf3138.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'route') AS route
FROM signoz_metrics.time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'kong_bandwidth_bytes'
GROUP BY route

2cf26128-4acf-4f59-8603-18ef7f9c7fc0.description: Filter metrics based on the deployment environment (e.g., production, staging).
2cf26128-4acf-4f59-8603-18ef7f9c7fc0.name: deployment_environment

54e9a0e1-b623-4afc-859d-277dffa2ade0.name: code
54e9a0e1-b623-4afc-859d-277dffa2ade0.queryValue: select DISTINCT(JSONExtractString(labels, 'code')) from signoz_metrics.time_series_v4_1day where JSONExtractString(labels, '__name__') = 'kong_http_requests_total'

ab4e18f3-213f-4fea-81aa-0ebbf3a5f3f9.description: Select specific Kong services to filter metrics.
ab4e18f3-213f-4fea-81aa-0ebbf3a5f3f9.name: service
ab4e18f3-213f-4fea-81aa-0ebbf3a5f3f9.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'service') AS service
FROM signoz_metrics.time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'kong_kong_latency_ms_sum'
GROUP BY service

widgets.description: Shows the number of active connections currently managed by Kong.
widgets.title: Active Connections

widgets.description: Displays the total number of API requests handled by Kong.
widgets.title: Total Requests

widgets.description: Shows the number of accepted connections currently managed by Kong.
widgets.title: Accepted Connections

widgets.description: Shows the number of handled connections currently managed by Kong.
widgets.title: Handled Connections

widgets.description: Shows the memory consumption of Kong, helping identify potential memory leaks or inefficiencies.
widgets.title: Memory Usage - Kong

widgets.description: Shows the time taken to process API requests.
widgets.title: Request Latency

widgets.description: Displays the total number of errors encountered by Kong.
widgets.title: Total Errors

widgets.description: Illustrates the latency of upstream services that Kong communicates with during request processing.
widgets.title: Upstream Latency

widgets.description: Displays the amount of incoming traffic to Kong, measured in requests per second and data volume.
widgets.title: Incoming Traffic Volume

widgets.description: Shows the amount of outgoing traffic from Kong to upstream services.
widgets.title: Outgoing Traffic Volume

widgets.description: Shows the distribution of HTTP response status codes (e.g., 2xx, 4xx, 5xx) returned by Kong.
widgets.title: Response Status Codes

widgets.description: Displays the CPU usage by Kong pods/services, indicating the processing load.
widgets.title: CPU Usage
